title: Angelina Jolie looks radiant in a peach co-ord as she picks up toys for her kids in Fuerteventura
text:
She's currently in Fuerteventura filming new Marvel movie The Eternals.

Yet Angelina Jolie was enjoying some downtime on Saturday as she went on a shopping spree on the Spanish island.

Despite being known for her incredible sense of style, the 44-year-old actress wasn't buying anything for herself, but instead picking up toys for her children.

Stepping out in style: Angelina Jolie was enjoying some downtime on Saturday as she went on a shopping spree on the Spanish island

Angelina has been joined by Zahara, 14, and twins Knox and Vivienne, 11, whilst abroad, and appeared to be treating them to toys including a large stuffed rhinoceros.

The Oscar-winning star cut a chic figure on the outing as she slipped into a peach cardigan and maxi skirt combination that she teamed with flat sandals.

The mother-of-six swept her glossy chestnut locks back into a high ponytail, whilst she accessorised with a pair of oversized shades.

Doting mother: Despite being known for her incredible sense of style, the 44-year-old actress wasn't buying anything for herself, but instead picking up toys for her children

Angelina is playing superhero Thena in the new Marvel movie Eternals, due for release in November 2020.

Production is underway in the Dunes of Corralejo, with tents and trailers set up in the stunning Natural Park desert, which boasts 48,000 hectres of land.

The actress is set to join Salma Hayek, Richard Madden, Kumail Nanjiani, Scarlett Johansson and Don Lee in the big budget movie.

At the panel dedicated to Marvel during San Diego Comic Con, Angelina said: 'I’m so excited to be here! I think what it means to be a part of the MCU, what it means to be an Eternal, what it means to be in this family.

'We’ve all read the script and we know what the task is and so we are going to work very, very hard.'

Fellow cast-member Scarlett is set to reprise her role as Natasha Romanoff, aka Black Widow, for a spin-off prequel film after her character met her untimely end in Avengers: Endgame.

She previously gushed that it's 'very exciting' to have Angelina in the Marvel Cinematic Universe (MCU).

Angelina's outing comes as the Maleficent sequel has overtaken Joker for the weekend box-office crown in North America.
